attributes.action:
Keep schools open during any lockdowns.

Our children's futures are at stake!
attributes.additional_details:
Many parents are worried about our children's futures and more importantly their mental health. Schools provide so much more than an education. Some children only get a hot meal at school. For some children, school is their only safe place. Social interaction is imperative in a child's development too. 
Closing schools will be detrimental to many children and their parents/carers.
Closing schools will also alienate a lot of children. Especially those that do not have internet at home. Child suicides is another concern. With so many children reliant on school for many different reasons, we as parents demand the schools stay open.
attributes.background: KEEP THE SCHOOLS OPEN DURING THE PANDEMIC AND LOCKDOWNS.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558050
